title: My Plans for 2022
content:
With 2021 slowly coming to an end, I think it's time to look to the future! While I can wonder what 2022 will bring in my personal life, I can also create a plan of what I hope to achieve next year. Hopefully, it will give me a rough guideline about what I want to work on during the year.

But what is a plan without a goal? Nothing!

[quote]My goal for 2022 is to have the starting area for my campaign ready so I can start with a session zero for the campaign by the end of the year.|ShadowPhoenix[/quote]

Even though my plans for World Ember got thrown out of the window within a matter of.. well, hours really, I hope that this will still serve as a guideline to royally deviate from over the course of 365 days. There are a couple steps that I have to take to get things in shape and ready to undertake this huge chunk of writing for my world. I have taken the liberty to write these out for... well, myself primarily, but for you as well in case you want to nag me into doing proper work for my world.

[i]No worries, I appreciate the poking greatly! Accountability towards myself is close to non-existent so all help is appreciated! ^^[/i]

[h2]Articles![/h2]
Once I completed most of these tasks, it's time to do some serious writing! For that, everyone's favourite friend in WorldAnvil will help: stubs! I will be making a... probably too long for comfort list of stubs that I will most likely need to write to get everything set up for the start of the campaign. Hence, I'm creating two lists! Things that I still have to write, things that have written and published, and the absolute need-to-read articles if you want to get a proper understanding of the world that you just stumbled upon. So... three lists, not two.
